switch_on_display.description: Switch on the display by pressing the button.

switch_off_display.description: Switch off the display by pressing the button again.

clean_display_button.description: Clean the display button to ensure its smooth operation.

press_display_button.description: Press the display button to start the system or perform other tasks.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it works smoothly.

press_button.description: Press the button on the display.

clean_translation_screen.description: Clean the translation screen to provide better display clarity.

clean_screen.description: Clean the translation screen to remove smudges and ensure clear viewing.

wipe_display_base.description: Wipe the display base to remove dust and debris.

clean_base.description: Clean the display base to remove dirt and any other particles.

clean_display_base.description: Clean the base of the display for dust removal.

boot_up_display.description: Press the button to switch on the display and pull in the translation screen.

shut_down_display.description: Push out the translation screen and press the button to switch off the display.

clean_display_structures.description: Clean the button, translation screen, and display base to maintain the display.

press_and_slide_in.description: Press the button and then slide in the translation screen.

press_and_slide_out.description: Press the button and then slide out the translation screen.

clean_whole_display.description: Clean the entire display including the button, screen, and display base.
